标题: Deposits – Savings Account, Current Account, Fixed Deposit, Online Banking | DBS Singapore
网址: https://www.dbs.com.sg/personal/deposits/default.page
内容:
Earn up to 2.5% p.a. on first S$100,000 Simply open a new Multiplier account, credit your salary and spend with us! Up to S$12 cash reward specially for you Link your NRIC to PayNow with your DBS/POSB account to get started. Switch for a Sweet S$300 Payday Bonus! Simply switch your salary credit to DBS to enjoy. Get up to S$60 cashback with DBS Remit Simply use promo code NEWREMIT on your first overseas transfer! Get up to S$10 Cash Reward with PayNow Simply register for PayNow using your NRIC/FIN and Mobile Number. Bank Accounts, payments, and ways you can bank with us Maximise your savings with Fixed Deposit My Account - Instant Multi Currency Account Opening The one account that meets your deposit needs, customised to the way you live. Cash is King, but Cashless is Queen SMS Banking has ceased. Switch to Digital Services today. Banking Help & Support Useful Links Others Need Help? Help & Support Portal Phone - 1800 111 1111 Get In Touch with Us Markets

metadata.title: Deposits – Savings Account, Current Account, Fixed Deposit, Online Banking | DBS Singapore
